page.title: 02The People of Newport
page.content: We would like to record some interesting facts that appeared from a questionaire we sent to all residents in our area. 25% are over 65 yrs.old,23% 16 yrs.or under. 30% of the people are retired.50% are at school or in higher education. 16% of working population are unemployed. Walking is the most popular leisure activity,gardening,reading and television also more popular. Only 23% were born in Newport,39% were born elsewhere in Dyfed,but 38% were born outside Dyfed and these gave the reason for moving here as "Newport is pleasant to live/retire in". (Figures from a random sample of 500 questionaires returned.)
